code: import React from"react";import ServiceCard from"./ServiceCard";import{Col}from"reactstrap";import weatherImg from"../assets/images/weather.png";import guideImg from"../assets/images/guide.png";import customizationImg from"../assets/images/customization.png";import{Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const servicesData=[{imgUrl:weatherImg,title:"Calculate Weather",desc:"Description required"},{imgUrl:guideImg,title:"Best Tour Guide",desc:"Description required"},{imgUrl:customizationImg,title:"Customization",desc:"Description required"}];const ServiceList=()=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:servicesData.map((item,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Col,{lg:"3",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ServiceCard,{item:item})},index))});};export default ServiceList;
